possibilitiesBlock.title: Bot capabilities
possibilitiesBlock.description: Our service provides convenient tools for effective management of groups and channels

petProject.title: About the project
petProject.description: Our goal is to create a convenient service for managing groups and channels in Telegram, as well as gain practical experience in developing IT products

support.title: Support
support.description: If you like our service and want to help its development, you can support us with a donation. Your support will allow us to improve functionality, add new features and ensure smooth operation
